text.jpText: 前だけを見て ひたすらにボクは進む
text.enText: Looking straight ahead, I shall relentlessly push forward

text.jpText: Never Looking Back そう決して
text.enText: Never Looking Back, no matter what

text.jpText: 振り向かず 未来へ
text.enText: I'll head towards the future without looking back

text.jpText: 降り止まぬ雨が 行く手阻もうと
text.enText: Even if the relentless downpour tries to block my way

text.jpText: この[決意]<おもい>は 消せはしない
煙る視界も ぬかるんだ足元も
text.enText: Since even my hazy vision, and my muddied path

text.jpText: ボクを止めるなんて絶対 出来ないから
text.enText: Have no chance · of stopping me!

text.jpText: 思い通りにいかなくて 泣きたい日も
text.enText: Even on the days when nothing goes right and I want to cry

text.jpText: Don't Give It Up 信じてる
text.enText: Don't Give It Up, I still believe
In this passion that burns bright in my chest

text.jpText: 約束しよう もし何を試されても
text.enText: Let's promise that no matter what challenges we face

text.jpText: Never Looking Back そう決して
text.enText: Never Looking Back, no matter what
I won't look back and Believe Myself
